original_text: Also I took that sinful thing of yours, the calf you had made, and burned it in the fire. Then I crushed it and ground it to powder as fine as dust and threw the dust into a stream that flowed down the mountain.
korean_text: 너희의 죄 곧 너희가 만든 송아지를 가져다가 불살라 찧고 티끌 같이 가늘게 갈아 그 가루를 산에서 흘러내리는 시내에 뿌렸느니라

sentences.original_text: Also I took that sinful thing of yours
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 나는 너희의 그 죄된 것을 취하였고

sentences.original_text: and burned it in the fire
and ground it to powder as fine as dust
and threw the dust into a stream
